full_description:
Xtreme XJOGOS CF2N 12CM Fixed Color Casing Fan

The Xtreme XJOGOS CF2N 12CM is a Fixed Color Casing cooling fan that can enhance the ventilation and look of your computer case. It measures 12cm in diameter and comes in four fixed colors: red, green, blue, and white. It features a fluid bearing, which reduces noise and friction. It also contains 12 internal LEDs, which can produce a dazzling and multicolored lighting effect. The Xtreme XJOGOS CF2N 12CM Fixed Color Casing Fan comes with a 4-pin connection and a 500mm cable to connect to your power source or motherboard. It has a 1200 RPM (10%) speed and a noise level of 21 dB, indicating that it can provide efficient and quiet performance. The Xtreme XJOGOS CF2N 12CM Fixed Color Casing Fan is a long-lasting and fashionable fan that can keep your PC cool and appealing.

full_description:
Xtreme XJOGOS CF31R 3 In 1 ARGB Casing Fan With Remote Controller

The Xtreme XJOGOS CF31R 3 In 1 ARGB Casing Fan with Remote Controller is a cooling and lighting solution that can improve your computer's airflow and appearance. It comprises three 119 ARGB fans, a hub, and a remote control. The fans feature 11 ivory blades with inner and outer ring lights that can be programmed to show different colors and effects. A hydraulic bearing in the fans reduces noise and friction. The fans have a speed of 1100 RPM (10%) and a noise level of 12 dB (A), allowing for efficient and quiet functioning. The fans are equipped with a 5-pin connector and a 620mm cable that may be connected to the hub. The hub contains eight ports and a three-pin ARGB header for connecting to your motherboard or power supply. The hub also includes a remote controller for controlling the fan speed, color, mode, and brightness. The Xtreme XJOGOS CF31R 3-in-1 ARGB Casing Fan With Remote Controller is a long-lasting and fashionable solution that will keep your PC cool and appealing.

Xtreme XJOGOS CF30R 3 RGB Casing Fan

The Xtreme XJOGOS CF30R 3 RGB Casing Fan is a cooling and lighting solution that can enhance your computer's airflow and looks. It includes three 12cm ARGB fans, a control board with ten ports, and an aurora cable. The RGB lighting on the fans can display a variety of colors and effects. A hydraulic bearing in the fans reduces noise and friction. The fans have a speed of 1100 RPM (10%) and a noise level of 21 dB (A), allowing for efficient and quiet functioning. The Xtreme XJOGOS CF30R 3 RGB Casing Fan is equipped with a 5-pin connector and a 620mm cable that can be connected to the control board. The control board includes 10 ports as well as a 3-pin ARGB header for connecting to your motherboard or power supply. The control board also includes an aurora wire for controlling the fan speed, color, mode, and brightness. The Xtreme XJOGOS CF30R 3 RGB Casing Fan is a long-lasting and fashionable solution that can keep your PC cool and appealing.
